mapper.insert: insert into money (sn, name, salary, job, traffic, tel, meal, every, proportion, holiday, total) values (#{sn}, #{name}, #{salary}, #{job}, #{traffic}, #{tel}, #{meal}, #{every}, #{proportion}, #{holiday}, #{total})
mapper.update: update money set sn = #{sn}, name = #{name}, salary = #{salary}, job = #{job}, traffic = #{traffic}, tel = #{tel}, meal = #{meal}, every = #{every}, proportion = #{proportion}, holiday = #{holiday}, total = #{total} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, sn, name, salary, job, traffic, tel, meal, every, proportion, holiday, total from money where id = #{id}
select id, sn, name, salary, job, traffic, tel, meal, every, proportion, holiday, total from money
